articles.title: What if tropical diseases had as much attention as COVID? - Nature.com
articles.description: As the COVID-19 pandemic threatens to erode huge gains against much more devastating infections, I look for silver linings.
articles.content:
All year, COVID-19 has commandeered the worlds attention. It is as if no other disease has ever been more important, more contagious or more deadly.
I founded a non-profit research institute in 2008… [+5240 chars]
